mapper.update:
update YOU_BORKER_PURCHASE
CASE_ID = #{caseId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CASE_TYPE = #{caseType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
COMP_ID = #{compId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DEPT_ID = #{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ARCHIVE_ID = #{archiveId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IS_RETURN_INTEGRAL = #{isReturnIntegral,jdbcType=TINYINT},
COST_INTEGRAL = #{costIntegral,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
COMPLAIN_FLAG = #{complainFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT},
CREATION_TIME = #{creationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CITY_ID = #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
YOU_SHARE_FLAG = #{youShareFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT},
YOU_SHARE_ID = #{youShareId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TARGET_COMPLAIN_FLAG = #{targetComplainFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where PURCHASE_ID = #{purchaseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update YOU_BORKER_PURCHASE set CASE_ID = #{caseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CASE_TYPE = #{caseType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, COMP_ID = #{compId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DEPT_ID = #{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ARCHIVE_ID = #{archiveId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, IS_RETURN_INTEGRAL = #{isReturnIntegral,jdbcType=TINYINT}, COST_INTEGRAL = #{costIntegral,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COMPLAIN_FLAG = #{complainFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, CREATION_TIME = #{creationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CITY_ID = #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, YOU_SHARE_FLAG = #{youShareFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, YOU_SHARE_ID = #{youShareId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TARGET_COMPLAIN_FLAG = #{targetComplainFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where PURCHASE_ID = #{purchaseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT FU.USER_NAME, FU.USER_MOBILE, FD.DEPT_NAME, YBC.* from YOU_BORKER_PURCHASE YBC LEFT JOIN FUN_USERS FU ON YBC.USER_ID=FU.USER_ID AND YBC.ARCHIVE_ID=FU.ARCHIVE_ID LEFT JOIN FUN_DEPTS FD ON YBC.DEPT_ID=FD.DEPT_ID WHERE YBC.YOU_SHARE_ID=#{youShareId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
